I'm having a problem with the Vertical Scrollbar when their are some hidden rows on the datagrid.

The Grid is a Tree view List.  So I dynamically populate inner nodes when expanded and hide them when node gets collapsed.  The problem is that once I hide them, the Vertical Scrollbar size increases and when I try to scroll down, the scrollbar size keeps on shrinking and only after scrolling down for the while does it actually scroll down the grid.
